Source.Name: nvtop
Source.Summary: GPUs process monitoring for AMD, Intel and NVIDIA.
Source.Description: NVTOP stands for Neat Videocard TOP, a (h)top like task monitor for AMD, Intel and NVIDIA GPUs. It can handle multiple GPUs and print information about them in a htop-familiar way.
